title: [Self-Directed] Blended Teaching Methodology to Improve EFL Learners' Awareness of Mechanical Writing Errors

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English writing proficiency and writing experience
context.additional_context: Practice-Centered Education Using Digital Devices, Providing Customized Feedback for Professional Practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can identify errors in spelling, punctuation, and capitalization in their writing with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can exchange feedback that reduces perception gaps regarding machine errors between learners and instructors by over 50%.
